projects.description: Displays 12 employees with data pulled out from randomusers.me. By clicking an employee card, the details are shown in an overlay. Possibility to switch through currently displayed employees in the modal. Searchfilter to search for empoloyees is added

main.alt: screenshot of employees's directory main page

img1.alt: screenshot of employees's directory main page

img2.alt: screenshot of employees's directory main page

img3.alt: screenshot of employees's directory main page
